member.name: M:mage.FreeAligned(System.Void*)
member.summary: Frees a block of memory that was allocated with AllocAligned.
member.param: A pointer to the memory block that was allocated. This function returns if points to NULL.

member.name: M:mage.AllocAligned(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Allocates memory on an alignment boundary of 64 bytes.
member.param: The requested size in bytes to allocate in memory.
member.returns: A pointer to the memory block that was allocated or NULL if the operation failed. The pointer is a multiple of the alignment of 64 bytes.
